snippet: Alex Ovechkin is playing even fewer minutes against the Rangers than he did against Boston. And yet the less he plays, the more effective an offensive weapon he seems to be.
abstract: Washington Capitals winger Alex Ovechkin and team are preparing for Game 7 of Eastern Conference semifinals against New York Rangers.

byline.contributor: Tim Wendel contributed reporting from Arlington, Va.

lead_paragraph: Alex Ovechkin is playing even fewer minutes against the Rangers than he did against Boston. And yet the less he plays, the more effective an offensive weapon he seems to be.

headline.seo: Capitals’ Ovechkin Is Making More Out of Less
headline.main: Ovechkin Making More Out of Less
headline.print_headline: Ovechkin Making More Out of Less
